en.content: The echoing call comes again, and this time it is answered by something closer to you. This seems a good time to get off the ground.
You select a tree with obvious footholds and a thick branch at about twice your height. You haul yourself up. You are not dressed for this.

text.content: Make a Climb roll. Only if you fumble will make a difference.

zh.content: 这带着回响的嗥叫再次响起，这次有什么离你更近的东西在呼应着嗥叫。看起来现在是个逃离地面的好机会。
你找到一棵有明显立足点的树，选了大概两人高的一个坚实枝杈。你慢慢挪动上去，可你的衣服并不适合爬树。

text.content: 进行一次「攀爬」检定。只有当你掷出大失败，才会有不同的分支。

text.en: You roll 96 or over, this is a Fumble, continue
